ewita dawith, ”aho saminduni, ahithopelge manthranaya anuwanakamak bawata harewuwa manawa”yi ki ya. 32 thawada, dewiyan wahanseta namaskara karana sthanaya wana kanda mudunata dawith pamini wita, arkiya jathika hushayi thamage uthuru saluwa iragena, hisa pita pas damagena ohuge peramangata aaye ya. 33 dawith ohuta mese ki ya: ”oba ma samanga giyoth oba mata barak wannehi ya. 34 eheth, oba nagarayata hari gos, absalomta katha kara, ‘rajathumani, mama obe sewakaya wemi; palamu wa obe piyage sewakayeku wa siti lesa ma dan obe sewakayek wemi’yi kiyannehi nam, ma udesa ahithopelge manthranaya nishpala karannata obata puluwan wanne ya. 35 pujakayan wana shadok ha abiyathar oba samanga ehi sitinawa nowe da?

swistarlanthaye jiniwa nuwara di 42 wani warata pawathwu lowa pramukhathama nawa nirmana pradarshanaya wana nawanirmana tharagaya niyojanaya kala shri lankika wishwawidyala sisun dedena lokada padakkam dekak dina ganimata samath wi thibe.shri lankawa niyojanaya karamin lokada padakkam dekak dinagath peradeniya wishwawidyalaye pi.wi.em.pi. galgamuwa shishyaya saha moratuwa wishwawidyalaye em.ee. firos shishyaya eeye (9) udasana diwayinata pamini athara usas adhyapana amathyanshaya saha shri lanka nawa nirmanakaruwange sangamaya ekwa katunayaka guwanthotupale di owun mahath harasarin yuthuwa piligena thibe.usas adhyapana amathi es.bi. disanayaka mahathage upades paridi mema shishyayanta jiniwa nawa nirmana pradarshanayata sahabhagi wimata guwan tikatpath athulu purna anugrahakathwaya dakwimata usas adhyapanaya amathyanshaya katayuthu kara thibini.peradeniya wishwawidyalaye ji.wi.em.pi. galgamuwa shishyayage saha waidya mohomad ishad mahathage samuhika nirmanayak wana "pasu prasawa rudhira wahanaya palanaya kirimata yoda gatha haki wadidiyunu kala kondam kathitaya" saha moratuwa wishwawidyalaye em.ee. firos shishyaya wisin nirmanaya karana lada "ushnathwaya anuwa swayankriyawa wenaswana widuli pankawa" mema jathyanthara pradarshanaye di lokada padakkam dina gaththe ratawal 45k samanga tharaga karamini.katunayaka guwanthotupale di me sisun piliganime awasthawata usas adhyapana amathyanshaya wenuwen em.el.em. nirosha sanjiwani, shri lanka nawanirmanakaruwange sangamaye sahakara komasariswarun wana gamika prathapsinha saha dipika kahatapitiya mahathma mahathmihu athulu pirisak sahabhagi wuha..
